Luxury is only for the priviliged?
What gave you that idea?

Extraordinary Luxury, Exquisite Design.

The K300 faucet represents a new direction in Pegasus style and artistry. It’s sculptural design and clean and unencumbered refinement will make any home décor look sleek and contemporary.
